cab.content: This Document Is the Property ofIPMia Britannic, Majestys Governmenttary Secret.10493.TM,MIL *iJyJfFrom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,' Uth August 1919.(Received 15th.) 11066. 14th August. No. 92.Part I. (1) Except sniping and wire cutting round Dakka, all is quiet north Waziristan.(2) Few raids by Mahsuds and Sherarmis have occurred in Derajat. Some friction reported between Mahsuds and Wana Waziris.(3) Waziris, who did not return home from vicinity of Eort Santleman (see my No. 91 of Uth), now reported bp]it up into gangs towards Derajat border. .Part II.-(4) Operations on 13th against lashkars estimated at 1,500 strong in Tochi about mile 13, resulted in enemy abandoning positions.without fighting.Paragraph 3 not communicated to Press.
